task.title: Access alternate audio tracks
task.shortdesc: Late-binding audio uses MediaPlayer to play a video that is specified in an M3U8 HLS playlist and that can contain several alternate audio streams.

step.cmd: Wait for the MediaPlayer to be in at least the PREPARED status.

ul.li: MediaPlayerItemEvent.ITEM_CREATED: The initial list of audio tracks is available.
MediaPlayerItemEvent.AUDIO_UPDATED: Audio tracks changed during playback

step.cmd: Get the available audio tracks from the MediaPlayerItem instance.
(Optional) Present the available tracks to the user.
Set the selected audio track on the MediaPlayerItem instance.
